psychometRics 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Alpha Cronback scan

    alpha.scan.Rd

    the function provide the variation of relaibility of alpha when an item is drop from the data.

    Usage

    alpha.scan(data, items, digits = 3, parallel = FALSE, verbose = TRUE)

    Arguments

    data

    a data.frame containing the test or scale response in columns

    items

    The name of the items (should be >1 )

    digits

    Number of digits in the table summary

    parallel

    Bool use doSNOW and parallel when there is a great number of items

    verbose

    Bool for progression visualisation

    Value

    return a table with the variation of the alpha when the item is remove from the pool

    Examples

    data("inference")
items <- c(paste0("item_0",3:9),"item_10")
alpha.scan(inference, items)
#> progres: 1/8
#> progres: 2/8
#> progres: 3/8
#> progres: 4/8
#> progres: 5/8
